apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolume
metadata:
  name: example-persistent-volume
spec: 
  storageClassName: standard
  capacity:
    storage: 10Gi
  volumeMode: Filesystem
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteMany
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
  nfs:
    server: 172.10.1.1
    path: /tmp/pv
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
metadata:
  name: example-persistent-volume-claim
spec:
  storageClassName: standard
  resources:
    requests:
      storage: 500Mi
  volumeMode: Filesystem
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteMany
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      environment: "prod"
```

```
apiVersion: v1
